profile:
Since 1995 Mountain Air has been an owner/operator furnace cleaning and air duct cleaning company serving customers in Wetaskiwin, Camrose and everywhere in between. Our motto is: "We are always in the area!" 

We specialize in furnace cleaning and air duct cleaning, but we also offer: chimney cleaning, dryer vent cleaning, boiler cleaning, central vac cleaning, and ductwork sanitization.

Why Consider Us as Your Clean Air Specialists?
-We are an owner operated business ... we care about the quality of our work.  
-Since 1995 we have provided duct cleaning services in Camrose and Wetaskiwin.
-We have Cleaned over 10,000 furnaces with thousands of satisfied customers.  
-Our business operations are fully insured, giving you complete peace of mind.
-No mileage fees for our rural customers outside of Wetaskiwin and Camrose.
-No hidden fees accompany our competitive furnace and duct cleaning prices.
-We have a Satisfaction Guarantee! If we do not meet your expectations, corrective action will be taken immediately. If you are still unsatisfied we will happily refund your money.
name: Mountain Air Furnace And Duct Cleaning
